channel.title: Academy of Lions Radio
channel.description: Exploring the journey that is self-development, adventure and play. Hosts Brian Cauley and Dhani Oks examine the elements that drive today’s inspirational people and what makes them tick. Topics covered are constantly varied.

item.title: Masters of Movement – Episode 31
item.dc:creator: Brian Cauley
item.description: On this episode of Academy of Lions Radio Brian Cauley and Dhani Oks talk with Masters of Movement co-founders Shawn Mozen and Sara-Clare Lajeunesse. These two incredible people have built a practice on being “generalists” in fitness. Whether its Indian Clubs, Surfing, or Parkour, these two do it all and they love sharing their knowledge. Listen as Brian, Dhani, […]
item.content:encoded:
On this episode of Academy of Lions Radio Brian Cauley and Dhani Oks talk with Masters of Movement co-founders Shawn Mozen and Sara-Clare Lajeunesse. These two incredible people have built a practice on being “generalists” in fitness. Whether its Indian Clubs, Surfing, or Parkour, these two do it all and they love sharing their knowledge.

Listen as Brian, Dhani, Sara, and Shawn discuss trying, practicing, and embracing fear. Click here to register for the next Masters of Movement.

 

Listen to the Episode here:

Right click to download or subscribe in iTunes or Stitcher.

 

Our sincere apologies, this week due to our high volume of work with Masters of Movement there will be no WOW Comapnion Episode. We love making these episodes for you and we appreciate your understanding in this week’s lapse. – Brian and Dhani

 

**Let us know your questions by tweeting or reaching us on Facebook.**

Thanks to our sponsors and everyone who made this possible:

- Bikes on Wheels

- Town Barber

- Sully/Wong

- Arts & Crafts

On this episode of Academy of Lions Radio Brian Cauley and Dhani Oks talk with Masters of Movement co-founders Shawn Mozen and Sara-Clare Lajeunesse. These two incredible people have built a practice on being “generalists” in fitness. Whether its Indian Clubs, Surfing, or Parkour, these two do it all and they love sharing their knowledge.
